title: What are the effects of recent inventions on society? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's both good and bad. We get so much more information now, and it's easier to educate ourselves. But we're also getting obsessed with technology. We are relying on it for everything. We are spending more time in front of the computer and not socialising as much in person. I'm not saying that this is everyone, because there are still people who spend most of their time outdoors and stuff, but there aren't as many people as there were before. So it is both good and bad.

They create a “new normal” that makes people dissatisfied, not only with having a lifestyle they would have been over the moon about only 50 years ago, but with the new, improved lifestyle not continuing to get even better, and at an accelerating pace.
